name: Pop! (itch) (relativecminor)
description:
Play as Colonel Kernel as he tries to do what no popcorn kernel has tried to do before. Gather all four screwdrivers to unscrew the unique screws holding the escape panel in place!

Game created by Matthew Kalahiki, Ian Campbell and Cameron Minor.

Art and Music by Cameron Minor.

Font by https://www.dafont.com/8-bit-hud.font
